Operation 'getWebhooks' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary is clear and actionable, but missing description entirely. Added explanation of what is returned, the purpose of webhooks in the ZEIT context, and clarified that this is user-specific data requiring authentication.

data.current_summary: Get a list of existent webhooks
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all webhook subscriptions for the authenticated user. Returns an array of webhook objects, each containing the subscription URL, event types, and configuration details. Webhooks are used to receive ZEIT events at the specified endpoints.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable, but missing description entirely. Added explanation of what is returned, the purpose of webhooks in the ZEIT context, and clarified that this is user-specific data requiring authentication.

message: Operation 'createWebhook' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary is adequate but description is missing entirely. Added details about required inputs (URL, event types), what is returned (webhook object with ID), and side effects (webhook becomes active immediately). This helps AI agents understand what data to provide and what to expect.

data.description_suggestion: Creates a new webhook subscription to receive ZEIT events. Requires the webhook URL and event types to subscribe to. Returns the created webhook object with a unique ID and subscription details. The webhook will immediately begin receiving POST requests for subscribed events.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description is missing entirely. Added details about required inputs (URL, event types), what is returned (webhook object with ID), and side effects (webhook becomes active immediately). This helps AI agents understand what data to provide and what to expect.

message: Operation 'deleteWebhooks' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary is clear but description is missing. Added information about the side effect (webhook stops receiving events), clarified the response type, and noted the permanent nature of deletion to help AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

data.description_suggestion: Deletes a webhook subscription by its ID. The webhook will immediately stop receiving ZEIT events. Returns a success response. This operation is permanent and cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing. Added information about the side effect (webhook stops receiving events), clarified the response type, and noted the permanent nature of deletion to help AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

message: Operation 'getDomains' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary is clear and specific but description is missing. Added details about what is returned (array of domain objects with specific properties) and the purpose of domains in the ZEIT context to improve AI agent understanding of when to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Gets a list of domains registered for the authenticating user.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all custom domains registered for the authenticated user. Returns an array of domain objects containing domain names, registration status, DNS configuration, and other domain-specific details. These domains can be used with ZEIT deployments.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and specific but description is missing. Added details about what is returned (array of domain objects with specific properties) and the purpose of domains in the ZEIT context to improve AI agent understanding of when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'getDomain' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary is clear and specific but description is missing. Added details about what is returned (domain object with specific properties), clarified the required parameter (domain name), and explained the purpose to help AI agents understand how to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_summary: Get a domain for the authenticated user by name
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific domain by name. Returns a domain object containing the domain name, registration status, DNS records, nameserver configuration, and other domain-specific settings. Requires the domain name as a path parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and specific but description is missing. Added details about what is returned (domain object with specific properties), clarified the required parameter (domain name), and explained the purpose to help AI agents understand how to use this operation and what to expect.
